vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Μελεά (Rec. -ᾶς, genitive, -ᾶ)
indecl., ὁ (Heb. מְלֵאָה),
Melea: Luk.3:31.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.31;
son of: Menna (G3104);
father of: Eliakim (G1662H)
§ Melea, indeclinable (Proper name), Lk. 3:31*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米利亞 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "我親愛的朋友: 關愛的對象"
買南的兒子，在耶穌的家譜裡 (路 3:31)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
米利亚 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "我亲爱的朋友: 关爱的对象"
买南的儿子，在耶稣的家谱里 (路 3:31)
